name: Hao Wen
desc: Hi everyone! My name is Hao, and I'm a senior concentrating in APMA-CS. I like fintech, systems, and all kinds of stuff. Outside of class, I love playing music and watching/making films. This is my first time UTAing blockchain and I'm super excited to get to know all you guys!
